title: Efficient Line Plotting with Matplotlib
description: In this tutorial, we will learn how to use the LineCollection function in Matplotlib to efficiently draw multiple lines at once. We will see how to plot multiple lines with different colors and styles, and how to use a masked array to mask some values. We will also learn how to use the ScalarMappable.set_array function to map an array of values to colors.

meta.title: Matplotlib LineCollection Tutorial | Python Visualization
meta.description: Learn how to use Matplotlib's LineCollection to efficiently draw multiple lines at once, with different colors and styles. Explore masking and color mapping techniques.
meta.keywords: Matplotlib, LineCollection, Python, Visualization, Data Plotting
